alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 1:46AM CDT until May 07 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 144 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corsicana, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to Half dollar size hail. Wind gusts to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Kerens, Trinidad, Angus, Navarro, Lake Halbert, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Rice, Retreat, Oak Valley, Mildred, Eureka, Goodlow, Powell, Mustang, Chatfield, Roane and Corbet. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 220 and 238. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flooding, especially known low-lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
